page.title: 12BROWNIES OF WESTWOODSIDE
page.content: {Brownies}meet at Haxey school at 6.15_7.30pm on Mondays and Thursdays. There are 36{Brownies}in our group all aged between 7 and 10. At meetings they play games, sing, do handicrafts, have sports evenings and parties. Sometimes Brown Owl organises trips. Not long ago they went to York to the Viking Centre. They have also been to Brownie Revels, Pack Holidays and Fun days. They have been collecting 1p for the people in Lebanon and milk bottle tops and silver foil for OXFAM. This year is the 75th birthday of {Brownies}and each girl has been given a badge. There are also birthday badges, venture badges and interest badges. The most important reason to become a{Brownie}is to learn how to be a better citizen.
